ComicInfo.Summary:
The Almighty Tallest have snubbed ZIM—again! Just because he hasn’t “conquered” anything, as if what those other Invaders are doing can be called “conquering”! If ZIM really wanted to, he could conquer an easy target like the local Burrito King restaurant, and show the Tallest what conquering’s all about! Actually, that’s a pretty good idea. And “Burrito King” is a pretty impressive title, too. Hmmmm…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Warren Wucinich | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Aaron Conley | 2 |
